text: Need Daniel Martinez for Mad Mex campaign. Budget around $1,548, looking for 1 x Lifestyle photography, 1 x Instagram post, 2 x 2-minute tutorial, 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x 3-minute vlog. 5 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
